name: facebook-group-poster
title: Facebook Group Auto Poster
description: This actor posts messages to Facebook groups using Selenium. Cookie-based login is disabled; it logs in using Username and Password.

Facebook_Profile_URL.title: Facebook Group URL List (Comma-separated)
Facebook_Profile_URL.description: List of Facebook group URLs separated by commas.

Message.title: Enter Your Message
Message.description: The text content of the post.

Username.title: Facebook Username (Optional)
Username.description: Your Facebook account username or email. Used if cookies are not provided.

Password.title: Facebook Password (Optional)
Password.description: Your Facebook account password. Used if cookies are not provided.
